item.title: Watch Netflix on Firefox with custom privacy settings (F7121-1331-P7)
item.description: Watch Netflix on Firefox with custom privacy settings (F7121-1331-P7) Just wanted to share some information which could save you a few hours. TL;DR: Set privacy.resistFingerprinting to false in about:config. If you are watching Netflix on Firefox using a custom configuration based on privacy (like privacytools.io) you might run into an error code like F7121-1331-P7. Netflix recommends reinstalling Firefox but we can do better. I checked all of my settings and came to the conclusion that privacy.
